prompts: Create a fierce fire-type Pokemon that has a striking yellow body and vibrant orange flames.
I want an agile fire-type creature with a sleek design and a bold color palette of orange and yellow.
Generate a Pokemon inspired by volcanic landscapes, showcasing fiery colors and a dynamic pose.
Make a powerful fire-type Pokemon with distinct features like flames on its back and a strong physique.
Imagine a Pokemon that embodies the essence of fire, displaying a mix of orange and yellow with a fierce expression.
Design a Pokemon that looks like it can burst into flames at any moment, featuring a unique color scheme.
Show me a fire-type Pokemon with a dramatic stance and a color gradient from yellow to orange.
